tool.name: createPrimer
tool.description: Create primer file for illumina cleaning with Trimmomatic or illuminPrep

param.name: barcode1
param.label: First barcode
param.help: Short nucleotide sequence used to identify this sample in multiplexing

param.name: barcode2
param.label: Second (optional) barcode
param.help: Leave blank if only one end was barcoded

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
-----
**What it does**
This tool creates a fasta file with primer/adapter sequences for trimmomatic to use while cleaning illumina data.
